LuaModule.Name: note
LuaModule.Initializer:
{ 
				Text = "Dear Member,

You have been invited by the Pedesii to join them in the party at PRZM Lounge, located 16 light-years away, in orbit around the remains of Planet Erodas! Come on over whenever you can if you want to party! We're open 24 hours a day 7 days a week! Feel free to drop by and have a good time!

Sincerely,
Club Prizm Staff. 

P.S. - If you are incapable of interstellar travel then simply activate this invitation! Do not lose it however, we cannot provide more copies!"
				}
